dcterms:creator: C. Intanagonwiwat
R. Govindan
D. Estrin
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate a data-centric routing paradigm called directed diffusion in wireless sensor networks, focusing on scalable and robust communication.
dcterms:title: Wireless Sensor Networks (WSN)

dcterms:creator: C. Wallenta
J. Kim
P.J. Bentley
S. Hailes
dcterms:description: A dataset used to study and detect interest cache poisoning attacks in sensor networks, utilizing an artificial immune algorithm.
dcterms:title: Interest Cache Poisoning (ICP)

dcterms:description: A dataset referenced in the context of statistical experiments conducted using a wireless sensor network simulation, specifically in ns-2, but not explicitly cited as a dataset.
dcterms:title: ns-2 Event Blocks

dcterms:description: Performance metrics used to evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed IDS model based on danger theory, but not explicitly cited as a dataset.
dcterms:title: Performance Metrics for DMP and AMP
